title: Distrustful Employee
description: As a porter working at Xadme's Guild Hall, I maintain a strong working relationship (StrengthScore: 131.25) but harbor significant distrust (TrustScore: -3.37). Despite my position as an employee at the Porter Guild Hall, there are unresolved issues regarding zero wages at Xadme's small warehouse business, which likely contributes to the negative trust dynamic between us.
